name: barkdown
description: Barking up the DOM tree. A modular, progressive, and beautiful Markdown and HTML editor

scripts.start: browserify -s barkdown -do dist/barkdown.js src/barkdown.js && watchify -s barkdown -dvo dist/barkdown.js src/barkdown.js & stylus -w src/barkdown.styl -o dist
scripts.scripts: jshint . && browserify -s barkdown -do dist/barkdown.js src/barkdown.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/barkdown.min.js dist/barkdown.js
scripts.styles: stylus src/barkdown.styl -o dist && cleancss dist/barkdown.css -o dist/barkdown.min.css
scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.deployment: git add dist && npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && bower version ${BUMP:-"patch"} && git reset HEAD~2 && git add . && git commit -am "Release $(cat package.json | jq -r .version)" && git push --tags && npm publish && git push
scripts.sync: git checkout gh-pages ; git merge master ; git push ; git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment && npm run sync

author: Nicolas Bevacqua <nicolasbevacqua@gmail.com> (http://bevacqua.io/)
